sn35.68:1.2: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, loko va assa lokapannatti va”ti?
sn35.68:1.3: “Yattha kho, samiddhi, atthi cakkhu, atthi rupa, atthi cakkhuvinnanam, atthi cakkhuvinnanavinnatabba dhamma, atthi tattha loko va lokapannatti vati …pe…
sn35.68:1.5: atthi mano, atthi dhamma, atthi manovinnanam, atthi manovinnanavinnatabba dhamma, atthi tattha loko va lokapannatti va.
sn35.68:2.1: Yattha ca kho, samiddhi, natthi cakkhu, natthi rupa, natthi cakkhuvinnanam, natthi cakkhuvinnanavinnatabba dhamma, natthi tattha loko va lokapannatti va …pe…
sn35.68:2.3: natthi mano, natthi dhamma, natthi manovinnanam, natthi manovinnanavinnatabba dhamma, natthi tattha loko va lokapannatti va”ti.
